title: Big item changes on the pbe.

replies.body:
Adaptive Helm will shit all over Azir, Aurelion Sol, and Taliyah.... Great. -_-

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 

I like the Guardian Angel changes though, Its supposed to be a second chance for ADC's, not a 1v5 item for tank/bruisers. These changes nudge it back in that direction a bit.

Reducing the crit reduction on Ranudins is stupid. Welcome back 100% ban rate Yasuo!

Gargoyles will get gutted the next patch after implementation (or before if we are lucky), tanky non-damage champs like Leona, Braum, Alistar, etc. just wont die. (and Zac with Iron elixir and Lulu's R will get HUGE)

The Dead mans change makes sense I suppose. Im not sure why it was needed, but it makes sense.

The Abyssal/Banshees change is kinda weird, its hard to see how the new items will feel. I can see why they did it. But its going do funny things with a lot of builds, and I think having HP on Abyssal will feel weird. Its making you choose between AP and Abyssal's passive. Which is a strange thing to do for an Item that was always more offensive than defensive. 

In general it seems like Riot wants less HP items and more resistance items?

im quite looking foward to the b veil change, i always though the passive cd was way to long.

tank fizz is really gonna love the new abyssal {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

The passive on it does feel a bit long, especially in teamfights where you often have no idea what was blocked, and often doesn't make much difference anyway. So that will be cool. 



Hmmmmm.... dont even talk about that... thats not a thing... ok...

>I like the Guardian Angel changes though, Its supposed to be a second chance for ADC's, not a 1v5 item for tank/bruisers.

I don't see how the changes change that all that much, you lose MR, but gain AD, so unless your full tank and really need the MR (which you build in other items anyway) there's not really all that much of a loss.

EDIT: Thinking on it more, i don't even think it really affects full tanks too bad, because they mostly stack health so don't normally need a heavy dependence on MR.
Loss of mr means this once  standard item for Galio is now almost useless.
100% read this as well if you haven't - https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/WgNuqAK8-midseason-durability-goals-and-direction

Thanks for that link!

Hearing the rationale behind it definitely offers some insight.
